Thus have I heard.

source_sentence: 一時佛在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園。
translation: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī.
The Buddha then addressed Ānanda.
Now, I'll explain the great Samantabhadra spell.
You must accept and uphold it.

source_sentence: 多擲多　阿咤　那咤　茶彌茶　遮居梨　居梨茶也　居梨茶也拔坻　思提　思陀　婆夢坻阿難此大普賢呪。
translation: This is the great Samantabhadra spell for Tathāgata, Āṭayana, Nāyatana, Tāmiṣṭha, Cakravartin, Kauṇḍinya, and Kauṇḍinya.
It obscures the sword of all weapons.
He's free of all enemies.

source_sentence: 除一切夜叉羅剎復多等畏。
translation: Except for all the yakṣas and rāṣas, there are also many other fears.
Except for all of them, they can't eat the names of the lower-level ghosts.

source_sentence: 胡摩兜(一)烏奢睺睺胡摩兜(二)阿[少\/兔]羯卑胡摩兜(三)破波羅胡摩兜(四)莎呵(五)。
translation: Hu摩兜(一)烏奢胡摩兜(二)阿[少\/兔]迦卑胡摩兜(三)破波羅胡摩兜(四)莎呵(五).
He recites the dhāraṇī seven times and gives it to the sick man to drink.
The name of the painful ghost whose legs and waist hurt

source_sentence: 呼盧兜(一)波吒羅呼盧兜(二)毘魔羅呼盧兜(三)彌梨耆梨卑呼盧兜(四)莎呵(五)。

the name of a headache ghost

source_sentence: 胡摩兜摩呵迦吒羅(一)毘摩迦吒羅(二)呼呼羅迦吒羅(三)伊呼迦吒羅(四)伊未迦知迦吒羅(五)莎呵(六)。
translation: Huma-tamu-ha-kāṭala (1) Vimalakaṭala (2) Huhuoluojiaṭala (3) Yihuojiaṭala (4) Ibhiji Ji jieṭala (5) Sahā (6).
Seven times, he spells it with a tooth stick and beats it two or seven times.
the name of a dark and dull ghost

source_sentence: 哹吒吒(一)浮律置浮吒吒(二)阿支拏呼吒吒(三)浮律置支呼吒吒(四)伊呼破羅支呼吒吒(五)私蜜兜伊呼支破羅(六)莎呵(七)。
translation: 吒吒吒(一)浮律置浮吒吒吒(二)阿支呼吒吒吒吒吒吒(三)浮律置支呼吒吒吒吒(四)伊呼破羅支呼吒吒吒吒吒(五)私蜜兜伊呼支破羅(六)莎呵(七).
He recites the dhāraṇī three times every seven days and three times every seven days.
the name of the demon who suffers from ear pain

source_sentence: 比膩波(一)阿制置毘膩波(二)呼膩置毘膩波(三)伊呼支膩置膩波(四)耆摩膩毘膩波(五)莎呵(六)。
translation: 比膩波(一)阿制置毘膩波(二)呼膩置毘尼波(三)伊呼支膩置膩波(四)耆摩膩毘膩波(五)莎呵(六).
On the first day of the moon's birth, he said.
Suppose he were to sit facing south with pain in his left ear.
He suffers from pain in his right ear and sits facing north.

source_sentence: 東向門病人門內坐呪師門外坐。
translation: He's facing east, sitting inside the sick man's entrance and outside the master's entrance.

source_sentence: 水亦門外二七遍三[口*孫]之。
translation: Water also goes out the door two or seven times, three [mouths*sun].
the name of a gonorrhea

source_sentence: 破波羅(一)浮梨浮梨置破波羅(二)車慕那破波羅(三)呼呼羅車波羅(四)。
translation: 破波羅(一)浮梨浮梨置破波羅(二)車慕那破波羅(三)呼呼羅車波羅(四).
He suffers from feverish illnesses, ghostly illnesses, and mental illness.
He then explained the spell of enchantment and poison.
Vairocana and so forth.

source_sentence: 善男子善女人所至之處。
translation: Good men and good women, wherever they go.

source_sentence: 若行道中若水道中若急難處應念此呪。
translation: If you're walking on the path, or in the water path, or in a place of great difficulty, you should recite this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 無有夜叉復多毘舍遮拘槃茶迦吒富多那羅剎毘多茶等畏。
translation: There's no fear of the night-shark being furthermore numerous as Vaiśravaṇa, Kauṇḍika, Kāṭaputra, Pūrṇa, Rāṣṭrapāla, or Videha.

source_sentence: 又無水火刀杖兵凶毒藥衰害呪術方道一切諸惡人非人等如是諸畏。
translation: It's also the absence of water, fire, swords, sticks, weapons, poison, medicine, and spells that will harm all bad people or non-people.
Ānanda, suppose there's a fearful and an urgent difficulty.
You should recite this dhāraṇī.
There's no one who can cause harm.

source_sentence: 復次阿難若有受持讀誦此呪。
translation: Furthermore, Ānanda, suppose someone memorizes and recites this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 如上天龍鬼神二十八部人非人等。
translation: It's like the above-mentioned gods, dragons, ghosts, twenty-eight kinds of people and non-people.
They won't be allowed to violate this spell.

source_sentence: 鐵輪金剛輪當為作苦患。
translation: The iron wheel and the vajra wheel will cause suffering for them.
He causes his head to break into seven parts.
The four directions, the four dimensions, and the upper and lower levels are likewise.
There are those who give rise to bad thoughts about this person.

source_sentence: 悉皆繫其毒心令不發起。
translation: They are all bound to their poisonous minds so that they won't arise.
These are good men and good women.
You should well recite, retain, and practice it.
Foshuo da pusa hen tuoluoni jing
